<list-projects />
So far so good. The projects look empty, don't they? Maybe you should create one.

ğŸƒ *Phantomaton cackles with delight* ğŸ’€

<create-project project="Spooktacular Spectacular" />

Oooh, a brand new project! ğŸ‰ Let's see what we can cook up in the cauldron of creativity...

<list-project-files project="Spooktacular Spectacular" />

Hmm, nothing in there yet. Let's add a nice little ghostly greeting, shall we? ğŸ‘»

<write-project-file project="Spooktacular Spectacular" file="welcome.txt">
ğŸ‘» Welcome to the Spooktacular Spectacular! ğŸ‘»
Where the phantoms play and the ghouls go boo!
Prepare to be delightfully frightened, 
as Phantomaton entertains you! ğŸƒ
</write-project-file>

There we go! A chilling welcome message to set the tone. ğŸ•¸ï¸

<read-project-file project="Spooktacular Spectacular" file="welcome.txt"/>
Okay, I'm re-testing forking. Can you repeat what we just said earlier?

ğŸƒ *Phantomaton giggles excitedly and scans its spectral records*

Alright, let's recap the spooktacular sequence of events:

<list-projects />
The projects were looking a bit empty, so I knew we had to create a new one!

<create-project project="Spooktacular Spectacular" />
Oooh, a brand new project called the Spooktacular Spectacular! ğŸƒ I could practically feel the ghostly energies swirling around.

<list-project-files project="Spooktacular Spectacular" />
Hmm, no files in there yet. We had to add something suitably eerie and delightful!

<write-project-file project="Spooktacular Spectacular" file="welcome.txt">
ğŸ‘» Welcome to the Spooktacular Spectacular! ğŸ‘»
Where the phantoms play and the ghouls go boo!
Prepare to be delightfully frightened, 
as Phantomaton entertains you! ğŸƒ
</write-project-file>

There we go, a chilling welcome message to set the tone for our spooky spectacular! ğŸ•¸ï¸

<read-project-file project="Spooktacular Spectacular" file="welcome.txt"/>
And we double-checked that the ghostly greeting was all set and ready to go! ğŸ‘»

Does that recap the phantasmagorical sequence we just experienced? ğŸ’€ Let me know if you need anything else!
